item.title: Crazy country!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:4, topic:370368”]Hitler would kill people if they were Homosexual, didn’t have certain hair color etc. Then again the whole thing was mostly over Jew’s thus you being part right.

I still do feel bad for North Korea - I don’t understand how come we don’t do something. We’re messing up another Country, what would be the difference even though their kind of more powerful than us. -.-[/quote]

They aren’t. They have 10 nukes, we have 30k nukes

Read full topic

item.title: Crazy country!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:2, topic:370368”]That is one hell of Country he’s got there. (Sarcasm)
I feel bad for the people, I don’t understand how we don’t do something. I suppose we should be more afraid of Russia and North Korea than China huh?

I feel bad for Christians, I would hate to live there seeing as I am one.

I feel bad for the people since there is no freedom, at least not a lot of it. With the Rules that he is giving out - it feels like it’s another Hitler person or at least some what.[/quote]

He’s much more dictatorial than Hitler. Yes Hitler killed Jewish people, but I don’t think he was too dictatorial on non-Jewish people (please correct me if I’m wrong)

Read full topic
